name: Ivo, Head of the Secret Police
description:
FRAZZLE: Play a Blood Tithe from your Persona Deck. Activate this ability only during your main phase and only once per turn.
Whenever a Character you control would take damage to pay a [BLOOD TITHE], put that many cards from the top of your deck into your graveyard instead.

name: Lucrezia, Progenitor of Vampires
sets: Dawn of the Celestial Shadow, Structure Deck: Blood Harvest
description: [TURN END]: Add a Blood Tithe from your Persona Deck to your hand. Otherwise, if your Persona Deck is empty, flip this card.

name: Lucrezia, Progenitor of Vampires
sets: Dawn of the Celestial Shadow, Structure Deck: Blood Harvest
keywords: alter ego, breakthrough, enter, deal, heal
description:
[ALTER EGO 5] [BREAKTHROUGH]
[ENTER]: Deal 2 damage to target Character, then [HEAL 2] target Vampire.

name: Burning Blood
description: [BLOOD TITHE 1]: Deal X damage to target Character, where X is the damage on it.

name: Bond of Eternal Subservience
sets: Dawn of the Celestial Shadow, Structure Deck: Blood Harvest
description: [BLOOD TITHE 2]: Search your deck for a Supporter and put it into play.

name: Lesser Hemomancy
sets: Dawn of the Celestial Shadow, Structure Deck: Blood Harvest
description: [BLOOD TITHE 2]: Target Vampire you control gets [PREEMPTIVE STRIKE] and “Whenever this card deals combat damage, [HEAL X] target card, where X is the dealt damage” until end of turn.

name: Ritual of Rebirth
sets: Dawn of the Celestial Shadow, Structure Deck: Blood Harvest
description: [BlOOD TITHE 2]: Return target Vampire that costs 2 or less from your graveyard to play.

name: Blood Scythe
sets: Dawn of the Celestial Shadow, Structure Deck: Blood Harvest
description: [BLOOD TITHE 3]: Target Vampire gets +1 ATK and [BREAKTHROUGH] until end of turn.

name: Brutal Frenzy
description: [BlOOD TITHE 3]: Target Vampire gets [ASSAULT] or [EXPLOSION 1] until end of turn.

name: Crimson Cage
description: [BlOOD TITHE 3]: All opposing Characters gets -1 ATK and lose [SHIELD 1] until end of turn.

name: Exsanguinate
sets: Dawn of the Celestial Shadow, Structure Deck: Blood Harvest
description: [BLOOD TITHE 3]: Deal 2 damage to target Character, then [HEAL 2] target Vampire.

name: Mark of the Favored
description: [BLOOD TITHE 3]: Target Supporter gets +1 ATK and “Whenever this card would take damage, deal that many damage to your Protagonist instead.” until end of turn.

name: Pact for Knowledge
description: [BlOOD TITHE 3]: Look at the top 4 cards of your deck. Add one to your hand, then put the rest on the bottom of your deck.

name: Heirs of the Subservient Lineage
description: [SHATTER]: If this card was shattered to pay a [BLOOD TITHE], you may PAY 1 or deal 2 damage to your Protagonist. If you do, return this card from your graveyard to play.

name: Crowd Instigator
description: FRAZZLE: Target Character gets +1 ATK until end of turn.

name: Naive Suitor
description:
[SHATTER]: Look at the top card of your deck. If it’s a Vampire, reveal it, and add it to your hand.
If you control a Vampire, this card gets +1 ATK.

name: Young Vampire
sets: Dawn of the Celestial Shadow, Structure Deck: Blood Harvest
description: If there is a Blood Tithe in your graveyard, this card gets +1 ATK and [PREEMPTIVE STRIKE].

name: Sly Informant
sets: Dawn of the Celestial Shadow, Structure Deck: Blood Harvest
description:
[ISOLATE]
[SHATTER]: Deal 1 damage to your Protagonist.

name: Sacrificial Maiden
sets: Dawn of the Celestial Shadow, Structure Deck: Blood Harvest
description: [SHATTER]: Target Vampire gets +2 ATK and [BREAKTHROUGH] until end of turn.

name: Pain Fanatic
sets: Dawn of the Celestial Shadow, Structure Deck: Blood Harvest
description: This card gets +1 ATK for each damage on it.

name: Tithe Enthusiast
sets: Dawn of the Celestial Shadow, Structure Deck: Blood Harvest
description: This card gets +1 ATK for each Blood Tithe in your graveyard.

name: Estate Chauffeur
sets: Dawn of the Celestial Shadow, Structure Deck: Blood Harvest
description:
[ASSAULT]
[ENTER]: If you don’t control another Supporter, search your deck for a Supporter that costs 1 or less and put it into play.

name: Gennaro, Unreliable Bully
description: If another Character you control is shattered, retire this card.

name: Secret Police Officer
description: [BLOOD TITHE 2]: This card gets +2 ATK until end of turn. Activate this ability only during your main phase and only once per turn.

name: Ravenous Vampire
description: [BLOOD TITHE 2]: This card gets +2 ATK until end of turn. Activate this ability only during your main phase and only once per turn.

name: Corpses' Bride
description: This card gets +1 ATK for each Character in your graveyard.

name: Daughters of Aristocracy
description:
[PREEMPTIVE STRIKE]
Whenever a Character is shattered by a Vampire or to pay a [BLOOD TITHE], this card gets +2 ATK until end of turn.

name: Bloodthirsty Fighter
sets: Dawn of the Celestial Shadow, Structure Deck: Blood Harvest
description:
[ASSAULT]
Whenever this card shatters an opposing Character while attacking, [HEAL 2] this card.

name: Deranged Officer
sets: Dawn of the Celestial Shadow, Structure Deck: Blood Harvest
description: [BLOOD TITHE 2]: This card gets +1 ATK and [EXPLOSION 1]. Activate this ability only once per turn.

name: Dominant Interrogator
description:
[ISOLATE]
Whenever a Character you control is shattered, leave it in play until end of turn.
Whenever a Character you control leaves play, [HEAL 1] this card.

name: Lone Hunter
description: [BLOOD TITHE 3]: Deal 1 damage to target Character, then [HEAL 1] this card. Activate this ability only once per turn.

name: Lounge Singer
description:
[ISOLATE]
This card gets -1 ATK and -1 HP for every other Character you control.

name: Information Decryptor
description:
[ISOLATE]
Cards with [ISOLATE] you control get [ASSAULT] and “Whenever this card shatters an opposing Character while attacking, [HEAL 1] this card”.

name: Progenitor's Housekeeper
description: If your Protagonist is a Vampire, both it and this card get +1 ATK and [PREEMPTIVE STRIKE].

name: Raider of Regime
description: [ISOLATE] [PREEMPTIVE STRIKE]

name: Twins of the Household
sets: Dawn of the Celestial Shadow, Structure Deck: Blood Harvest
description: [ENTER]: If a Character was shattered this turn by a Vampire or to pay a [BLOOD TITHE], this card gets [ASSAULT] and [ISOLATE] until end of turn.

name: Isabella, First Descendant
sets: Dawn of the Celestial Shadow, Structure Deck: Blood Harvest
description:
[ISOLATE]
[ENTER]: You can play a Blood Tithe from your Persona Deck.

name: Growing Suspicions
description:
Whenever an opposing Character is shattered by a card with [ISOLATE] you control, all opposing cards get -1 ATK until end of turn.
Retire this card: Target card with [ISOLATE] gets +1 ATK until end of turn.

name: Progenitor's Estate
description:
Vampires you control gets +1 ATK.
Supporters you control gets +1 HP.

name: Sacrifice Offering
description: Shatter target Supporter you control: [HEAL 2] target Vampire, then look at the top card of your deck. You may put it at the bottom of your deck. Copy this ability X times, where X is the cost of the supporter shattered this way.

name: Vigor of Nourishment
description: Target Vampire gets +1 ATK until end of turn.

name: Curse of the Occult Arts
description: Deal 2 damage to target Character. If it didn’t shatter, it gets -1 ATK until end of turn.

name: Keldan, Dauntless Explorer
sets: Structure Deck: the Hero's Journey, Dawn of the Celestial Shadow
